manual_dl_remarks.Euroc: The dataset must be in the "ASL Dataset Format" version
manual_dl_remarks.OpenlorisMain: You have to fill in this form first to gain access: http://intellabs.sv.mikecrm.com/Nv8LzXF
manual_dl_remarks.OpenlorisMarket: You have to fill in this form first to gain access: http://intellabs.sv.mikecrm.com/Nv8LzXF
manual_dl_remarks.Tum512: The dataset  must be in the "Euroc / DSO 512x512" format
manual_dl_remarks.Tum1024: The dataset  must be in the "Euroc / DSO 1024x1024" format
